frameworks.name: SOC 2
frameworks.description: SOC 2 is a voluntary compliance standard for service organizations, developed by the American Institute of CPAs (AICPA), which specifies how organizations should manage customer data.

frameworks.name: NIST 800-53 Rev 5
frameworks.description: NIST 800-53 is a publication that recommends security controls for federal information systems and organizations and documents security controls for all U.S. federal information systems, except those designed for national security.
